items.title: Collaborative Task Boards
items.description: Implement shared task boards where team members can create, assign, and track tasks in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a new shared board and invite team members
Tasks can be assigned to specific team members
Changes to tasks are visible to all members within 5 seconds
Users can update task status and details
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users per board
UI updates should reflect changes within 5 seconds
Data should be stored securely with role-based access control

notes: Requirement is high-level; assumptions made about real-time updates, role-based access, and concurrent usage.
